title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Lina Khan to co-chair NYC mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani’s transition team
items.description: Khan's appointment sends a message to the tech industry, whose most powerful players have already been critical of Mamdani, a Democratic socialist.

items.title: Zohran Mamdani’s Campaign Figured Out How to Channel Fandom
items.description: Much of the content about Mamdani online hasn’t come from his campaign or the dozens of political influencers invited to cover it. It has also come fr...

items.title: Pinterest CEO touts open source AI: ‘tremendous performance’ with reduced costs
items.description: Pinterest CEO Bill Ready says open source AI is offering cost savings to the company, particularly in visual search.

items.title: Apple nears deal to pay Google $1B annually to power new Siri, report says
items.description: Apple is turning to Google's technology to help revamp Siri and power a slate of upcoming features for the voice assistant.

items.title: Meet the Chinese Startup Using AI—and a Small Army of Workers—to Train Robots
items.description: AgiBot is using AI-powered robots to do new manufacturing tasks. Smarter machines may transform physical labor in China.

items.title: The Pixel 10 Family Is Marked Down on Amazon
items.description: You can snag a discount on all the Pixel 10 phone varieties if you act fast.

items.title: Zohran Mamdani Just Inherited the NYPD Surveillance State
items.description: In addition to affordability, New York City’s mayor-elect will be forced to reckon with the NYPD’s sweeping mass surveillance operations.

items.title: Cluely’s Roy Lee hints that viral hype is not enough
items.description: Lee declined to share Cluely's financial metrics just four months after boasting how quickly the startup is growing.

items.title: Lucid Motors’ chief engineer leaves after 10 years
items.description: Eric Bach, who was once the director of engineering at Tesla, is out amid a larger executive shakeup at the company.

items.title: The AI Data Center Boom Is Warping the US Economy
items.description: Microsoft, Alphabet, Meta, and Amazon are investing tens of billions in data centers. AI infrastructure is now a key driver of US economic growth.
